docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: In his Oct. 18 Opinion Page article, ''Bad Advice About the Problems of Radon,'' Prof. Leonard A. Cole [ of Rutgers-Newark ] criticized the state's Department of Environmental Protection for its adoption of the 4-picocurie/liter of air standard for radon remediation.
